org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml

Class AssetNodesByDoi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.content.xml.AssetNodesByDoi

  • public class AssetNodesByDoi
extends Object
    A set of article XML nodes, each representing an asset, mapped by the asset's DOI.

      • getNodeCount

        public int getNodeCount()
        Get the number of XML nodes contained in this object.
        Returns:
        the number of XML nodes

      • getDois

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSet<String> getDois()
        Get the set of all asset DOIs contained in this object. The returned set preserves the order that they appear in the original document.
        Returns:
        the asset DOIs

      • getNodes

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Node> getNodes(String doi)
        Get the XML nodes associated with a DOI. Typically the returned list will contain exactly one node. It is valid (but rare) for an article XML document to contain multiple asset nodes with the same DOI, in which case the returned list contains them in their order from the original document.
        Parameters:
        doi - an asset DOI
        Returns:
        a non-empty list
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no asset matching the DOI (equivalently, if !this.getDois().contains(doi))
        NullPointerException - if doi == null
